name: Spellcraft (Junglerally Studios)
description:
Spellcraft is a game where you kill creatures to get elements to make spells. You can have up to 3 spells equipped at once. There are 15 spells to make! Made in  9 days for Jamcraft.

TIPS
- Enemies have a percent chance to drop an element depending on the difficulty. The higher it is, the higher the chance to drop!
- Remember, to equip spells after you press "Craft", go to the spellbook in the other corner of the room. 
- Spells you cast can also hurt you, so be careful!

Big thanks to Carbon_4444 for the 3D models, and lunaticchild for the sounds!
